title: Horizon Esports Recruiting a serious ADC!
body:
Need an ADC for Ranked 5s. (Dynamic Queue)
Must be at least Gold V & Have Teamspeak + Skype for VODS
Not looking for individual skill but people who want to improve their game and understand that they are the reason they can't climb any further. You need to have an open schedule.
Practice is at 6-10 pm EST Mon.-Fri.
Post your in-game name, Season 5 & 6 rank, main role, top 3 ADCs, and age.
Ill get back to you, please do not add me I will not accept.
P.S. Practice starts on Monday.
